venue.address_1: The riverside plaza across from market basket 11 kimball drive suit 124
venue.name: The NH Dog Company

item.description:
JUST ADDED

The Green Mountain Pug Rescue will also be joining us on Saturday August 4th for our grand opening day. Come meet the volunteers and see all the wonderful things that GMPR does for Pugs in need. We will also be having a special raffle for this table for any and all donations!

 

 

 

 

 

Come check out our future meet up location. We will be having free raffles, free nail clipping, and doggie bags for anyone who signs up for our mailing list. The SPCA will be here sharing information about all the good work they do and there will be a special raffle for any and all donations to the animal rescue league of NH so bring your change! : ) The fenced in area will be open all day so you can just bring your pups and play out back too. We will have a couple small pools, cool water, and shade if the weather is hot. When we start our regular meet ups it will be exclusively for our members only. If you have any questions please feel free to send me an email. Hope to see everyone there!

group.name: Manchester New Hampshire pug/small dog meet up group

item.name: The Grand opening of The NH Dog Company
